panels.description: Shows the successful API call percentage of all APIs exposed by the server.
panels.title: API Success

panels.description: The 95th percentile response time (considering all APIs). Represents the maximum latency experienced by 95% of requests, measured in seconds.
panels.title: Latency (p95)

panels.description: Requests per second. Shows the current throughput of all API calls being handled by server.
panels.title: RPS

panels.description: Shows version information for all trust domain deployments, helping track different versions in use.
panels.title: Trust Domain Deployment Versions

panels.description: Shows network traffic received by each pod, measured in bytes per second.
panels.title: Network Bandwidth - Received

panels.description: Shows network traffic transmitted by each pod, measured in bytes per second.
panels.title: Network Bandwidth - Transmited

panels.description: Current CPU utilization for each pod, measured in CPU cores.
panels.title: Pods CPU Usage

panels.description: Current memory usage for each pod, measured in bytes.
panels.title: Pods Memory Usage

panels.description: Maximum allocated CPU cores for each pod based on resource limits.
panels.title: Pods CPU Limit

panels.description: Maximum allocated memory for each pod based on resource limits.
panels.title: Pods Memory Limit

panels.description: Percentage of CPU usage compared to the pod limit. Values approaching red indicate pods nearing their CPU resource limits.
panels.title: Pods CPU Usage Limita

panels.description: Percentage of memory usage compared to the pod limit. Values approaching red indicate pods nearing their memory resource limits.
panels.title: Pods Memory Usage Limit

panels.description: Out of Memory events count. Shows how many times pods have been terminated due to memory limits being exceeded.
panels.title: OOM Events

panels.description: The 99th percentile response time. Represents the maximum latency experienced by 99% of requests.
panels.title: Response Time (p99)

panels.description: The 90th percentile response time. Represents the maximum latency experienced by 90% of requests.
panels.title: Response Time (p90)

panels.description: The 50th percentile (median) response time. Represents the typical latency experienced by most requests.
panels.title: Response Time (p50)

panels.description: Rate of messages sent and received through streaming operations, showing the bidirectional traffic volume.
panels.title: Streaming Ops Throughput

panels.description: Requests per second. Shows the current throughput of API calls being handled by RPC.
panels.title: RPS

panels.description: Percentage of API calls resulting in errors. Lower values indicate better service health.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{
pod=~"$pods",
grpc_service=~"com.spirl.agent.v1.agent.API|com.spirl.agent.v1.session.API",
grpc_code!="OK"}[$interval])) by (grpc_method) /
sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{
pod=~"$pods",
grpc_service=~"com.spirl.agent.v1.agent.API|com.spirl.agent.v1.session.API"}[$interval])) by(grpc_method)

panels.title: Error Rate
